description: Dashboard per la visualizzazione di varie tipologie di sensori dislocati in una citt√†

targets.rawSql: SELECT cella, argMax(value,timestamp) from innovacity.healthScore group by cella

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
     argMax(value, timestamp) as value,
    'Termometro' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.temperatures
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
   CASE
        WHEN argMax(value, timestamp) = 0 THEN 'Libera'
        WHEN argMax(value, timestamp) = 1 THEN 'Occupata'
        ELSE NULL
    END as value,
      CASE
        WHEN value = 'Libera' THEN 0
        WHEN value = 'Occupata' THEN 100
        ELSE NULL
    END as color_picker,
    'Colonnina di ricarica' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.chargingStations
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
      CASE
        WHEN argMax(value, timestamp) = 0 THEN 'Nessuna rilevazione'
        WHEN argMax(value, timestamp) = 1 THEN 'Rilevata Acqua'
        ELSE NULL
    END as value,
      CASE
        WHEN value = 'Nessuna rilevazione' THEN 0
        WHEN value = 'Rilevata Acqua' THEN 100
        ELSE NULL
    END as color_picker,
    'Sensore presenza acqua' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.waterPresence
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
      argMax(value, timestamp) as value,
    'Igrometro' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.humidity
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
   CASE
        WHEN argMax(value, timestamp) = 0 THEN 'Nessun guasto'
        WHEN argMax(value, timestamp) = 1 THEN 'Guasto rilevato'
        ELSE NULL
    END as value,
      CASE
        WHEN value = 'Nessun guasto' THEN 0
        WHEN value = 'Guasto rilevato' THEN 100
        ELSE NULL
    END as color_picker,
    'Sensore guasto elettrico' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.electricalFault
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
     argMax(value, timestamp) as value,
    'Isola ecologica' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.ecoIslands
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
     argMax(value, timestamp) as value,
    'Polveri sottili' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.dustPM10
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
   avg( score.value)
FROM
    innovacity.healthScore score
JOIN (
    SELECT
        MAX(timestamp) AS max_timestamp,
        cella
    FROM
        innovacity.healthScore
    GROUP BY
        cella
) last_timestamps ON score.cella = last_timestamps.cella AND score.timestamp = last_timestamps.max_timestamp
where cella In (${Cella})

SELECT 
    ID_sensore as tmp_sensors_id,
    max(timestamp) AS last_timestamp,
    argMax(value, timestamp) AS last_value
FROM 
    innovacity.temperatures
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore
SELECT distinct ID_sensore as tmp_sensors_id , cella as Cella from innovacity.temperatures

SELECT 
    ID_sensore,
    avg(value) as value,
    $__timeInterval(timestamp) as timestamp
FROM 
    innovacity.temperatures
    WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND cella IN ($Cella) AND ID_sensore in (${tmp_sensors_id})
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore, timestamp;

SELECT
  avg(value) as avgTemperature
FROM innovacity.temperatures
WHERE ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND  cella IN ($Cella) AND ID_sensore IN ($tmp_sensors_id);

SELECT 
    ID_sensore as umd_sensors_id,
    max(timestamp) AS last_timestamp,
    argMax(value, timestamp) AS last_value
FROM 
    innovacity.humidity
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore
SELECT distinct ID_sensore as umd_sensors_id , cella as Cella from innovacity.humidity

SELECT
  avg(value) as avgUmdity
FROM innovacity.humidity
WHERE  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND cella IN ($Cella) AND ID_sensore IN ($umd_sensors_id);

SELECT 
    ID_sensore,
    avg(value) as value,
    $__timeInterval(timestamp) as timestamp
FROM 
    innovacity.humidity
    WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND cella IN ($Cella) AND ID_sensore in (${umd_sensors_id})
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore, timestamp;

SELECT 
    ID_sensore as dstPM10_sensors_id,
    max(timestamp) AS last_timestamp,
    argMax(value, timestamp) AS last_value
FROM 
    innovacity.dustPM10
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore
SELECT distinct ID_sensore as dstPM10_sensors_id , cella as Cella from innovacity.dustPM10

SELECT 
    ID_sensore,
    avg(value) as value,
    $__timeInterval(timestamp) as timestamp
FROM 
    innovacity.dustPM10
    WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND cella IN ($Cella) AND ID_sensore in (${dstPM10_sensors_id})
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore, timestamp;

SELECT
  avg(value) as avgPM10
FROM innovacity.dustPM10
WHERE  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND cella IN ($Cella) AND ID_sensore IN ($dstPM10_sensors_id);

SELECT 
    ID_sensore as ecoIs_sensors_id,
    max(timestamp) AS last_timestamp,
    argMax(value, timestamp) AS last_value
FROM 
    innovacity.ecoIslands
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore
SELECT distinct ID_sensore as ecoIs_sensors_id , cella as Cella from innovacity.ecoIslands

SELECT 
    ID_sensore,
    avg(value) as value,
    $__timeInterval(timestamp) as timestamp
FROM 
    innovacity.ecoIslands
    WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND cella IN ($Cella) AND ID_sensore IN ($ecoIs_sensors_id)
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore, timestamp;

panels.description: Mostra l'ultimo valore dello stato di rimepimento percentuale

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    eco.ID_sensore,
    eco.value,
    eco.timestamp
FROM
    innovacity.ecoIslands eco
JOIN (
    SELECT
        ID_sensore,
        MAX(timestamp) AS max_timestamp
    FROM
        innovacity.ecoIslands
    GROUP BY
        ID_sensore
) last_timestamps ON eco.ID_sensore = last_timestamps.ID_sensore AND eco.timestamp = last_timestamps.max_timestamp;

panels.title: Stato riempimento attuale

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    ID_sensore as wp_sensors_id,
    max(timestamp) AS last_timestamp,
    argMax(value, timestamp) AS last_value
FROM 
    innovacity.waterPresence
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore
SELECT distinct ID_sensore as wp_sensors_id , cella as Cella from innovacity.waterPresence

SELECT
    count(*) as numeroAcquaRilevata
FROM (
    SELECT
        ID_sensore,
        argMax(value,timestamp) AS last_value
    FROM innovacity.waterPresence
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($wp_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)
) last_values
WHERE last_values.last_value = 0

SELECT
    count(*) as numeroAcquaRilevata
FROM (
    SELECT
        ID_sensore,
        argMax(value,timestamp) AS last_value
    FROM innovacity.waterPresence
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($wp_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)
) last_values
WHERE last_values.last_value = 1

SELECT
        ID_sensore,
        argMax(timestamp,timestamp) as "Data ultima misurazione",
        argMax(value,timestamp) AS "Ultimo valore"
    FROM innovacity.waterPresence
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($wp_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)

SELECT 
    ID_sensore as colRic_sensors_id,
    max(timestamp) AS last_timestamp,
    argMax(value, timestamp) AS last_value
FROM 
    innovacity.chargingStations
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore
SELECT distinct ID_sensore as colRic_sensors_id , cella as Cella from innovacity.chargingStations

SELECT
    count(*)
FROM (
    SELECT
    ID_sensore,
    argMax(value,timestamp) AS last_value
    FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($colRic_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)
) last_values
WHERE last_values.last_value = 0

SELECT
    count(*)
FROM (
    SELECT
        ID_sensore,
    argMax(value,timestamp) AS last_value
    FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($colRic_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)
) last_values
WHERE last_values.last_value = 1

SELECT
        ID_sensore,
        argMax(timestamp,timestamp) as "Data ultima misurazione",
        argMax(value,timestamp) AS "Ultimo valore"
    FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($colRic_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)

SELECT 
    ID_sensore as eltcF_sensors_id,
    max(timestamp) AS last_timestamp,
    argMax(value, timestamp) AS last_value
FROM 
    innovacity.electricalFault
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore
SELECT distinct ID_sensore as eltcF_sensors_id , cella as Cella from innovacity.electricalFault

SELECT
    count(*)
FROM (
    SELECT
    ID_sensore,
    argMax(value,timestamp) AS last_value
    FROM innovacity.electricalFault
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($eltcF_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)
) last_values
WHERE last_values.last_value = 0

SELECT
    count(*)
FROM (
    SELECT
        ID_sensore,
    argMax(value,timestamp) AS last_value
    FROM innovacity.electricalFault
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($eltcF_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)
) last_values
WHERE last_values.last_value = 1

SELECT
        ID_sensore,
        argMax(timestamp,timestamp) as "Data ultima misurazione",
        argMax(value,timestamp) AS "Ultimo valore"
    FROM innovacity.electricalFault
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ID_sensore IN ($eltcF_sensors_id)
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT cella
FROM (
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.temperatures
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.humidity
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.ecoIslands
UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.waterPresence
)
list.label: Seleziona cella
list.name: Cella
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT cella
FROM (
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.temperatures
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.humidity

    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.ecoIslands
UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.waterPresence
)
